author: jeastman
msg: MAHOUT-524: Moved numEigensWritten initialization out of loop. SpectralKMeans now runs to completion but display routing is expecting a 2-d vector and is getting a 5-d vector. Not clustering the original input points. More to test but CleanEigensJob is working.
